summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.9°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.4°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.8°C), and feels like temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; you’ll experience very high heat, extremely taxing outdoors. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and gentle breezes are expected. Showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and very bright daylight. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
